name_min_length: Name must be at least 2 characters long
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
role_invalid: Role must be buyer or seller
profile_picture_invalid: Profile picture must be a valid URL
property_type_invalid: Property type must be one of: HOUSE, APARTMENT, LAND, COMMERCIAL, WAREHOUSE
property_status_invalid: Property status must be one of: ACTIVE, PAUSED, SOLD
min_price_must_be_number: Minimum price must be a number
min_price_min_value: Minimum price must be at least 0
max_price_must_be_number: Maximum price must be a number
max_price_min_value: Maximum price must be at least 0
min_area_must_be_number: Minimum area must be a number
min_area_min_value: Minimum area must be at least 0
max_area_must_be_number: Maximum area must be a number
max_area_min_value: Maximum area must be at least 0
sort_by_invalid: Sort by must be one of: price, createdAt, updatedAt, areaSqm, bedrooms, bathrooms
sort_order_invalid: Sort order must be ASC or DESC
ne_lat_must_be_number: Northeast latitude must be a number
ne_lat_invalid: Northeast latitude must be a valid latitude
ne_lng_must_be_number: Northeast longitude must be a number
ne_lng_invalid: Northeast longitude must be a valid longitude
sw_lat_must_be_number: Southwest latitude must be a number
sw_lat_invalid: Southwest latitude must be a valid latitude
sw_lng_must_be_number: Southwest longitude must be a number
sw_lng_invalid: Southwest longitude must be a valid longitude
search_query_must_be_string: Search query must be a string
search_query_min_length: Search query must be at least 2 characters long
